00047 class Triples
00048 {
00049 public:     
00051     void insert(unsigned int subject, unsigned int predicate, unsigned int object);
00054     TripleID retrieveTriple(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z);
00055 
00057     virtual void console() = 0;
00059     void clustering();
00066     void gnuplot(unsigned int npredicates, vector <string> predicates, unsigned int max, string path);
00068     void graphSort();
00070     unsigned int size();
00072     virtual bool transformToN3() = 0;
00074     virtual unsigned int write(string path) = 0;
00075     
00077     virtual bool loadGraphMemory()=0;
00078     
00080     virtual bool serialize(char *output, char *format) = 0;
00081 
00083     void calculateDegrees(string path);
00084     
00085     Dictionary *getDictionary() {
00086         return dictionary;
00087     }
00088     
00089     int getParsing() {
00090         return parsing;
00091     }
00092     
00093     vector<TripleID> &getGraph() {
00094         return graph;
00095     }
00096     
00097     void convertParsing(unsigned int to);
00098 
00099     void calculateDegree(string path);
00100     void calculatePredicateHistogram(string path);
00101     
00102 protected:
00103     Dictionary *dictionary;
00104 
00105     vector<TripleID> graph;
00106 
00107     unsigned int parsing;
00108 
00109     unsigned int ntriples;
00110     string path;
00111 
00122     void gnuplotHeader(unsigned int firstP, unsigned int sizeP, string predicate, 
00123                unsigned int xmin, unsigned int xmax, unsigned int ymin, unsigned int ymax, string filename);
00124 
00125     bool static sortXYZ(const struct TripleID c1, const struct TripleID c2)
00126     {
00127         if ((c1.x) < (c2.x)) return true;
00128         else
00129         {
00130             if ((c1.x) > (c2.x)) return false;
00131             else
00132             {
00133                 if ((c1.y) < (c2.y)) return true;
00134                 else
00135                 {
00136                     if ((c1.y) > (c2.y)) return false;
00137                     else
00138                     {
00139                         if ((c1.z) < (c2.z)) return true;
00140                         else return false;
00141                     }
00142                 }
00143             }
00144         }
00145 
00146         return true;
00147     }
00148 };
